meanings.definition: Sesquicentenaries: plural noun, a 150th anniversary or its celebration.
meanings.sent1: The town's sesquicentenaries were marked with a big parade.
meanings.sent2: We attended the sesquicentenaries of the school last year.
meanings.sent3: The sesquicentenaries of the library were so festive, they lasted a whole week!
meanings.sent4: The sesquicentenaries of the park brought the community together like never before.
meanings.sent5: The sesquicentenaries of the museum were filled with historical exhibits and joyous celebrations.

meanings.definition: Sesquicentenaries: verb, to celebrate a 150th anniversary.
meanings.sent1: They decided to sesquicentenaries their town's founding with a grand event.
meanings.sent2: We plan to sesquicentenaries our company's establishment next year.
meanings.sent3: Let's sesquicentenaries our friendship with a special dinner!
meanings.sent4: The community came together to sesquicentenaries the historic event.
meanings.sent5: We will sesquicentenaries our school's founding with a memorable ceremony.
